import React from "react"; import {useState, useEffect, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button, ListGroupItem } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../components/Rating"; import axios from "axios"; const ProductScreen = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState({}) const { id: productId } = useParams(); return ( <> Go Back

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: ${product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: ${product.countInStock > 0 ? "In Stock" : "Out of Stock"} ); }; export default ProductScreen;
